TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveProjectBase

Docs.summary: Determines the output files for non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput` task searches for a special property set by the [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] IDE for the list of project GUIDs and their associated outputs. The IDE only pre-resolves non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects and in this way separates [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references from non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] references. The IDE returns the list of [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects as UnresolvedProjectReferences. This enables the task to use more powerful [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] mechanisms to manipulate just the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references, such as. calling into specific targets of references to get the manifest file name, which would not be possible with a mixed list of [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] and non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Execute() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets or sets an XML string containing resolved project outputs.
Docs.value: An XML string containing resolved project outputs.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets resolved reference paths that preserve the original project reference attributes.
Docs.value: The resolved reference paths that preserve the original project reference attributes.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets project reference items that are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.
Docs.value: Project reference items that are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Since [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] only pre-resolves non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects, the project reference items that could not be resolved using the pre-resolved list of outputs are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.
